attributes.name: assetToBeAbandonedDisposedOfOtherThanByForSaleDate
attributes.description: The date on which the asset is to be abandoned or disposed of other than by for sale.

attributes.name: businessUnitCode
attributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

attributes.name: currencyId
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: depreciationRate
attributes.description: Rate at which depreciation will be charged on the carrying amount of fixed assets.

attributes.name: fixedAssetAccumulatedDepreciation
attributes.description: Value of depreciation to date on the asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetAccumulatedDepreciationAccount
attributes.description: Account to which accumulated depreciation or depreciation is posted in the GL.

attributes.name: fixedAssetAcquisitionDate
attributes.description: The date when the fixed asset was acquired.

attributes.name: fixedAssetAssetAccount
attributes.description: Asset account to which this asset is consigned, may be used to categorise assets or associate them with specific cost or project centres or geographic locations.

attributes.name: fixedAssetAvailableForSaleDate
attributes.description: The date at which the asset is classified as available for sale.

attributes.name: fixedAssetBarcode
attributes.description: Universal Product Code or other general identifier.

attributes.name: fixedAssetCIPAccount
attributes.description: Construction in Progress account to which the asset is allocated.

attributes.name: fixedAssetCIPFlag
attributes.description: Flag to identify fixed assets which are Construction in Progress (CIP).

attributes.name: fixedAssetClass
attributes.description: Class of fixed assets to which the asset is assigned, e.g. equipment, vehicles, land, etc.

attributes.name: fixedAssetCode
attributes.description: Code used to identify the fixed asset type.

attributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciableBasis
attributes.description: Value of the asset against which depreciation is calculated.

attributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciationAccount
attributes.description: Account to which depreciation is charged for this fixed asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetDescription
attributes.description: Description of the fixed asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetDisposalDate
attributes.description: The date on which the asset is sold or discarded.

attributes.name: fixedAssetFairValue
attributes.description: Estimated amount of the fair value of the asset on the open market, used for valuation.

attributes.name: fixedAssetGroup01
attributes.description: Internal group to which the fixed asset is assigned.

attributes.name: fixedAssetGroup02
attributes.description: Internal group to which the fixed asset is assigned.

attributes.name: fixedAssetId
attributes.description: ID associated with fixed asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetInServiceDate
attributes.description: Identify the service date when the asset was first placed.

attributes.name: fixedAssetInactiveFlag
attributes.description: Flag to identify assets as inactive or not in use.

attributes.name: fixedAssetNetBookValue
attributes.description: The value of fixed assets after deducting the accumulated depreciation and accumulated impairment expenses from the original cost of fixed assets.

attributes.name: fixedAssetOriginalCost
attributes.description: Purchased cost of the asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetQuantityOnHand
attributes.description: The fixed asset quantity that are available for use.

attributes.name: fixedAssetRealisedGainLossAccount
attributes.description: Account to which realised gains or losses on assets is posted in the GL.

attributes.name: fixedAssetReplacementCost
attributes.description: Estimated cost to replace fixed asset, used for valuation purposes.

attributes.name: fixedAssetRetirementDate
attributes.description: The date of fixed asset retirement.

attributes.name: fixedAssetSalvageValue
attributes.description: Estimated amount of consideration the entity would expect to receive on scrapping the asset for salvage at the end of its useful life.

attributes.name: fixedAssetType
attributes.description: Identify the type of fixed asset, e.g. buildings, computer equipment, software, furniture, land, machinery, and vehicles.

attributes.name: fixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAccount
attributes.description: Account to which unrealised gains or losses on assets is posted in the GL.

attributes.name: fixedAssetUsefulLife
attributes.description: The period/time an asset is expected to be functional and fit-for-use.

attributes.name: fixedAssetUsefulLifeRemaining
attributes.description: The period/time an asset is expected to be functional and fit-for-use from the current date.

attributes.name: locationCode
attributes.description: A code used for identifying the location of fixed assets.

attributes.name: locationDescription
attributes.description: Text description of the location where the fixed asset can be found.

attributes.name: locationId
attributes.description: ID of the location of the fixed asset.

attributes.name: lotNumber
attributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

attributes.name: manufacturerId
attributes.description: Fixed asset manufacturer ID.

attributes.name: projectId
attributes.description: Project ID to which the fixed asset relates to.

attributes.name: segment01
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment02
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment03
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment04
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment05
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: serialNumber
attributes.description: Serial number for asset, used by manufacturer for identification.

attributes.name: supplierId
attributes.description: Identifier of the supplier from whom the asset was purchased and to whom payment is due. Must match the supplierId in supplierMasterData.

attributes.name: supplierName
attributes.description: Name of the supplier.

attributes.name: userDefined1
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userDefined2
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.
